subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3827, how did it go?
description_text:
I still do not have any confirmation nor traceability if it has been
shipped.

El mié, 17 dic 2025, 23:08, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> escribió:

> Hello Ignacio Ricardo, We would be grateful if you shared how things look
> and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it

conversations.body_text: 你好 warrendongo5，  ​ 您的订单原计划从我们的德国仓库发货，但由于运输延误，货物到达时间晚于预期。目前货物已抵达仓库，我们正在进行入库处理并安排DHL快递发货。我们将于明日提供运单号。

Any updates?

El lun, 22 dic 2025, 12:27, service@simsonn.com
